https://tmrev.io/movie/943827-A Month of Hungry Ghosts 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pQbyPVDGGheQWrJJa6b5sEAdea4.jpg In parts of Asia each year, during the seventh lunar month, it is believed that the gates of Hell are opened and all the souls are set free to wander the Earth. At this time, many spirits roam around trying to fulfill their past needs, wants and desires. These are the "hungry ghosts". A Month of Hungry Ghosts
